text:
"The Babysitter" is a 2017 American teen comedy horror movie directed by McG and written by Brian Duffield. It stars Samara Weaving, Judah Lewis, Hana Mae Lee, Robbie Amell and Bella Thorne.
The movie was released by Netflix on October 13, 2017, and received mostly positive reviews from critics. A sequel, ', was released on September 10, 2020.
